snow_storage_snowball.tooltip: Instantly absorbs the surrounding snow and stores it inside when throwing it.
snowman_in_hand.tooltip: Scattering is reduced when shift is pressed.
snowman_in_hand1.tooltip: Charge it by Right clicking snow.
snowman_in_hand2.tooltip: The Correct Usage of a Snow Golem.
snowball_cannon1.tooltip: Launching high speed snowballs with power.
snowball_cannon2.tooltip: Not affected by the player's own effects.
snowball_cannon3.tooltip: Snowballs can be fired directly from the snowball storage tank.
snowball_cannon4.tooltip: Launch snowballs with additional frozen effect.
obsidian_snowball.tooltip: How did you stuff it in
compacted_snowball.tooltip: Not very damaging, but extremely insulting
ice_snowball.tooltip: It doesn't matter, it's all H2O
snowball_machine_gun1.tooltip: Launch snowballs at a high rate of fire.
snowball_machine_gun2.tooltip: Only snowballs from the storage tank can be launched.
snowball_storage_tank1.tooltip: Snowballs can be put into the storage tank when right click with snowballs while the off hand item is the tank.
snowball_storage_tank2.tooltip: Snowballs can be taken out from the storage tank when right click with the storage tank while the off hand is empty.
snowball_storage_tank3.tooltip: Taking out snowballs when shift is pressed can take out all snowballs at once.
black_hole_snowball1.tooltip: Starts faster when shift is pressed
LPT_snowball.tooltip: What? A missile made of water?
snowball_shotgun2.tooltip: Shoot when shift is pressed will consume snowballs to generate a large thrust.
snowball_shotgun3.tooltip: The amount of thrust is determined by the type of snowball consumed.
can_change.tooltip: Use when shift is pressed to switch modes
empty_basin.tooltip1: Right click snow or powder snow to load
snow_block_blender1.tooltip: Turning snow block into powder snow
snow_fall_boots1.tooltip: There is no fall damage when you fall on snow
subspace_snowball1.tooltip: Throw when shift is pressed to start damage conversion mode
repulsive_field_generator1.tooltip: Long press to generate force field to stop incoming projectiles nearby. Release to push them away.
snow_golem_mode_tweaker.tooltip: Right click to adjust behavior mode.
snow_golem_mode_tweaker1.tooltip: Right click when shift is pressed to adjust the target mode.
snow_golem_mode_tweaker2.tooltip: Right click an advanced snow golem to import settings.
target_locator.tooltip: Use iron snowball as ammunition to launch positioning snowball.
target_locator1.tooltip: Positioning snowball will return the target information to the locator when it hits the target.
target_locator2.tooltip: Right click an advanced snow golem to import target settings.
smart_snow_block0.tooltip: Place a smart snow block at the top of two snow blocks to create an advanced snow golem.
smart_snow_block1.tooltip: Right click the golem with a weapon or snowball storage tank to equip.
smart_snow_block2.tooltip: Advanced snow golem can't use machine guns, and can't throw snowballs without a weapon.
smart_snow_block3.tooltip: Right click the golem with empty hand to remove the tank. Right click with empty hand when shift is pressed to remove the weapon.
smart_snow_block4.tooltip: Use target locator and mode tweaker to modify golem's mode.
smart_snow_block5.tooltip: Feed the golem with smooth snowballs, snow blocks, and powder snow bucket to restore its health.
smart_snow_block6.tooltip: Feed the golem with ice to give regeneration effect.
smart_snow_block7.tooltip: Right click with snowball to switch the skin.
creative_snow_golem_tool.tooltip: Right click an advanced snow golem to enable the golem's enhanced mode.
creative_snow_golem_tool1.tooltip: Right click an advanced snow golem when shift is pressed to copy, and then right click a block to paste.
thrust_snowball1.tooltip: Not for shooting. Can only generate thrust in shotgun.
thrust_snowball2.tooltip: Snowball shotgun recoil will be the priority consumption of thrust snowball.
thrust_golem_core.tooltip: Generate thrust to launch golem when approached by the target.
swiftness_golem_core.tooltip: Increase the speed of the golem.
regeneration_golem_core.tooltip: Regain golem's health if not attacked for a period of time.
critical_snow_golem_core.tooltip: Generate critical snow along golem's movement path
repulsive_field_golem_core.tooltip: Let all nearby projectiles fly towards the target.
near_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Teleports to escape when approached by the target
ender_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Teleports before being hit by a projectile
active_teleportation_golem_core.tooltip: Actively teleports to behind the target
advancements.bsf.root.title: Better Snowball Fight
advancements.bsf.powder_snow_bucket_comb: Use powder snow bucket to attack a blaze
advancements.bsf.snowball_clamp_use.desc: Make a smooth snowball with your snowball clamp
advancements.bsf.glove_use.title: Not Today, Thank You II
advancements.bsf.glove_use.description: Catch a snowball with your glove
advancements.bsf.explosive_snowball.desc: Make some explosive snowballs to defend yourself
advancements.bsf.popsicle_consume.title: Cool Down
advancements.bsf.popsicle_consume.descri: Eat a popsicle or milk popsicle
advancements.bsf.snowball_cannon.title: Find It in a Frozen Chest?
advancements.bsf.smart_snow_block.title: Do you want to build a snowman?
advancements.bsf.empty_basin.title: Ice Basin Challenge
advancements.bsf.snowball_shotgun.title: pooon kaka
advancements.bsf.tracking_core.title: Ender technology, power unknown
advancements.bsf.unstable_core.title: I cracked
advancements.bsf.heavy_monster_tracking_: Unfortunately, there are no jamming bombs
advancements.bsf.vodka.title: Comrades!
snow_golem_locator_true.tip: Target: the entity in the target locator
